remarks: Lemma for properties of the polynomial quotient function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)
statement:
plydiv.pl $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x + y ) e. S ) $.
plydiv.tm $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x x. y ) e. S ) $.
plydiv.rc $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ x =/= 0 ) ) -> ( 1 / x ) e. S ) $.
plydiv.m1 $e |- ( ph -> -u 1 e. S ) $.
plydiv.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
plydiv.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
plydiv.z $e |- ( ph -> G =/= 0p ) $.
quotlem.8 $e |- R = ( F oF - ( G oF x. ( F quot G ) ) ) $.
quotlem $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F quot G ) e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ ( R = 0p \/ ( deg ` R ) < ( deg ` G ) ) ) ) $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
